statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'Main Building' AND energy_usage > 1000;
DELETE FROM smart_meters WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND energy_reading > 100
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id = 12345 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM meter_readings WHERE reading_id IN (SELECT reading_id FROM meter_readings WHERE meter_id = 54321);
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE meter_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND energy_reading < 100;
